title: Buyer's options as to salvage of rightfully
context: ยง490:2-604 Buyer&rsquo;s options as to salvage of rightfully rejected goods. Subject to the provisions of the immediately preceding section on perishables if the seller gives no instructions within a reasonable time after notification of rejection the buyer may store the rejected goods for the seller&rsquo;s account or reship them to him or resell them for the seller&rsquo;s account with reimbursement as provided in the preceding section.
